entry.title: The Special Educational Needs And Disability Act 2001 (Commencement No. 1) Order 2001

category.term: Special educational needs and additional support

entry.summary: This Order provides for the coming into force in England on 15th June 2001 of certain provisions of the Special Educational Needs and Disability Act 2001 to allow regulations relating to special educational needs (SEN) to be made in advance of the commencement of the balance of the provisions of the Act relating to SEN.

entry.title: Motor Vehicles (Driving Licences) (Fees) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2001
entry.summary: The Child Support, Pensions and Social Security Act (Northern Ireland) 2000 inserted a new Article 37A into the Child Support (Northern Ireland) Order 1991 whereby a court may order a person to be disqualified from driving on the grounds of non-payment of child support maintenance.

title.div: The Children (Leaving Care) Act 2000 (Commencement) (Wales) Order 2001 / Gorchymyn Deddf Plant (Ymadael â Gofal) 2000 (Cychwyn) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: This Order brings into force on 1st October 2001 in relation to Wales certain provisions of the Children (Leaving Care) Act 2000 (“the Act”).
Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn yn dod â darpariaethau penodol yn Neddf Plant (Ymadael â Gofal) 2000 (“y Ddeddf”) i rym ar 1 Hydref 2001.

title.div: The Carers (Services) and Direct Payments (Amendment) (Wales) Regulations 2001 / Rheoliadau Gofalwyr (Gwasanaethau) a Thaliadau Uniongyrchol (Diwygio) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: The Carers and Disabled Children Act 2000 imposes a duty on local authorities to assess the needs of carers in certain circumstances, and gives local authorities the power to then offer services to carers to support them in their caring role. It further enables local authorities to make direct payments to carers in lieu of the carers services they have been assessed as needing.

Mae Deddf Gofalwyr a Phlant Anabl 2000 yn gosod dyletswydd ar awdurdodau lleol i asesu anghenion gofalwyr o dan amgylchiadau penodol, ac yn rhoi i'r awdurdodau lleol y pŵer i gynnig gwasanaethau wedyn i ofalwyr i'w cefnogi yn eu rôl ofalu. Ymhellach, mae'n galluogi'r awdurdodau lleol i wneud taliadau uniongyrchol i ofalwyr yn lle'r gwasanaethau gofalwyr yr aseswyd bod arnynt eu hangen.

title.div: The Carers and Disabled Children Act 2000 (Commencement No. 1) (Wales) Order 2001 / Gorchymyn Deddf Gofalwyr a Phlant Anabl 2000 (Cychwyn Rhif 1) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: This Order brings into force on 1st July 2001 certain provisions of the Carers and Disabled Children Act 2000 (“the Act”) in relation to Wales.
Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn yn dod â darpariaethau penodol o Ddeddf Gofalwyr a Phlant Anabl 2000 (“y Ddeddf”) i rym ar 1 Gorffennaf 2001 mewn perthynas â Chymru.

title.div: The Disabled Children (Direct Payments) (Wales) Regulations 2001 / Rheoliadau Plant Anabl (Taliadau Uniongyrchol) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: The Carers and Disabled Children Act 2000 inserts into the Children Act 1989 a new section (section 17A) enabling local authorities to make direct payments to persons with parental responsibility for a disabled child or to a disabled child aged 16 or 17, in lieu of services which would have otherwise been provided for them by the local authority under section 17 of the Children Act.

Mae Deddf Gofalwyr a Phlant Anabl 2000 yn mewnosod adran newydd (adran 17A) yn Neddf Plant 1989 sy'n galluogi'r awdurdodau lleol i wneud taliadau uniongyrchol i bersonau sydd â chyfrifoldeb rhiant dros blentyn anabl neu i blentyn anabl 16 neu 17 oed, yn lle gwasanaethau a fyddai fel arall wedi'u darparu ar eu cyfer gan yr awdurdod lleol o dan adran 17 o'r Ddeddf Plant.

title.div: The Care Standards Act 2000 (Commencement No.3) (Wales) Order 2001 / Gorchymyn Deddf Safonau Gofal 2000 (Cychwyn Rhif 3) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: This Order appoints a day for certain provisions of the Care Standards Act 2000 (“the Act”) to come into force.
Mae'r Gorchymyn hwn yn pennu diwrnod i rai o ddarpariaethau Deddf Safonau Gofal 2000 (“y Ddeddf”) ddod i rym.

title.div: The Environment Act 1995 (Commencement and Saving Provision) (Wales) Order 2001 / Gorchymyn Deddf yr Amgylchedd 1995 (Cychwyn a Darpariaeth Arbed Tir Halogedig) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: Article 2 of this Order brings various provisions of the Environment Act 1995 (“the 1995 Act”) into force in respect of Wales on 1 July 2001.
Mae Erthygl 2 o'r Gorchymyn yn dod ag amryfal ddarpariaethau Deddf yr Amgylchedd 1995 (“Deddf 1995”) i rym mewn perthynas â Chymru ar 1 Gorffennaf 2001.

title.div: The Children (Leaving Care) (Wales) Regulations 2001 / Rheoliadau Plant (Ymadael â Gofal) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: These Regulations make provision about support for children and young people aged 16 and over, who are, or have been, looked after by a local authority.
Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch cymorth i blant a phobl ifanc 16 oed a throsodd, sy'n derbyn gofal, neu sydd wedi derbyn gofal, gan awdurdod lleol.

title.div: The Common Agricultural Policy (Wine) (Wales) Regulations 2001 / Rheoliadau'r Polisi Amaethyddol Cyffredin (Gwin) (Cymru) 2001

div.p: The Common Agricultural Policy (Wine) (Wales) Regulations 2001 revoke the Common Agricultural Policy (Wine) Regulations 1996 S.I. 1996/696 (as amended) in so far as they apply to Wales. The Regulations, which come into force on 1st August 2001, provide for the enforcement of EC Regulations (as specified in Schedules 1 and 2) concerned with the production and marketing of wine and related products.

Mae Rheoliadau'r Polisi Amaethyddol Cyffredin (Gwin) (Cymru) 2001 yn diddymu Rheoliadau'r Polisi Amaethyddol Cyffredin (Gwin) 1996 O.S. 1996/696 (fel y'i diwygiwyd) i'r graddau y maent yn gymwys i Gymru. Mae'r Rheoliadau, sy'n dod i rym ar 1 Awst 2001, yn darparu ar gyfer gorfodi Rheoliadau'r CE (fel y'u pennir yn Atodlenni 1 a 2) ynghylch cynhyrchu a marchnata gwin a chynhyrchion cysylltiedig.

title.div: The Contaminated Land (Wales) Regulations 2001 / Rheoliadau Tir Halogedig(Cymru) 2001

div.p: These Regulations, which apply to Wales only, make provision for certain aspects of a new scheme under Part IIA of the Environmental Protection Act 1990 (“the 1990 Act”) for the remediation of contaminated land.
Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn, sy'n gymwys i Gymru yn unig, yn darparu ar gyfer agweddau penodol ar gynllun newydd o dan Ran IIA o Ddeddf Diogelu'r Amgylchedd 1990 (“Deddf 1990”) ar gyfer adfer tir halogedig.

entry.title: The A15 Norman Cross to Grimsby Trunk Road (Tillbridge Lane Junction Improvement) Order 2001
entry.summary: This version of the The A15 Norman Cross to Grimsby Trunk Road (Tillbridge Lane Junction Improvement) Order 2001 is published under the authority and superintendence of the Queen's Printer of Acts of Parliament and Controller of HMSO. It has been prepared to reflect the text as it was Made.

entry.title: The Repayment of Student Loans (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2001
entry.summary: These Regulations, which come into force on 1st August 2001, amend the Repayment of Student Loans (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (“the principal Regulations”). The principal Regulations govern the repayment of income contingent student loans by students living and working abroad.

entry.title: The Students' Allowances (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2001
entry.summary: These Regulations, which come into force on 1st August 2001, amend the Students' Allowances (Scotland) Regulations 1999 (“the principal Regulations”). The principal Regulations govern allowances paid to students under the Education (Scotland) Act 1980.

entry.title: The Education (Student Loans) (Scotland) Regulations 2000 Amendment Regulations 2001
entry.summary: These Regulations, which come into force on 1st August 2000, amend the Education (Student Loans) (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (“the principal Regulations”). The principal Regulations govern loans under the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 for eligible students attending designated courses of higher education.

entry.title: The Lerwick Harbour Revision Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order authorises Lerwick Port Authority to extend and improve the existing Roll-on Roll-off Ferry Terminal Pier at Holmsgarth, Lerwick.

entry.title: The Designs (Convention Countries) (Amendment) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order, made pursuant to section 13(1) of the Registered Designs Act 1949 with a view to the fulfilment of obligations under the International Convention for the Protection of Industrial Property (“the Paris Convention”) (as revised at Stockholm in 1967) (Cmnd. 4431), declares Bhutan, Nepal and Tonga to be convention countries for the purposes of all the provisions of the Registered Designs Act 1949.

entry.title: The Patents (Convention Countries) (Amendment) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order, made pursuant to section 90(1) of the Patents Act 1977 with a view to the fulfilment of obligations under the International Convention for the Protection of Industrial Property (“the Paris Convention”) (as revised at Stockholm in 1967) (Cmnd. 4431), declares Bhutan, Nepal and Tonga to be convention countries for the purposes of section 5 of the Patents Act 1977. Section 5 of the Patents Act 1977 affords certain rights of priority to applicants for patents, and this Order extends these rights of priority to applications filed in those countries.

entry.title: The Education (Inspectors of Schools in England) (No.2) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order appoints the persons named in the Schedule as Her Majesty’s Inspectors of Schools in England.

entry.title: The Health and Safety at Work etc. Act 1974 (Application outside Great Britain) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order revokes and re-enacts with amendments the Health and Safety at Work etc. Act 1974 (Application outside Great Britain) Order 1995 (“the 1995 Order”), which applied sections 1 to 59 and 80 to 82 of the Health and Safety at Work etc. Act 1974 (“the prescribed provisions”) to certain premises and activities in the territorial sea adjacent to Great Britain and to areas designated under the Continental Shelf Act 1964. In addition to minor and drafting amendments, this Order makes the following changes of substance.
